definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: In a moment, you'll begin to feel light-headed, then drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 馬上，你會開始感到頭暈，然後昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: Get it checked out. Maybe the reason you're waking up drowsy is health-related.
sentences.chinese: 你起牀時昏昏欲睡的原因或許和健康有關。

sentences.english: The bus slopped  and that made me sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車發出有節奏的聲音使我昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: Are you feeling drowsy at work?
The drowsy browser knits its brows to browbeat the frowzy crow.
sentences.chinese: 昏昏欲睡的喫草動物皺眉頭恐嚇邋遢的烏鴉。

sentences.english: Large meals tend to make you feel drowsy and sleepy afterwards. Try eating 5 small meals spaced throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 大餐會使你飯後昏昏欲睡，試着每天進5次小餐。
溼乎乎的三明治會讓你午後昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: You want to be sharp, but you usually feel sleepy after lunch.
sentences.chinese: 你想要精力充沛，可你總是在午飯後感到昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: If you eat a heavy lunch, you’ll feel lethargic for most of the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 如果你午餐喫的太多，你會感到整個下午昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: Large meals can make you drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 大喫大喝會讓你昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: It blocks adenosine, a chemical that makes you drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 它阻擋腺苷，腺苷是一種使你昏昏欲睡的化學物質。

sentences.english: Maybe I eat too much and that's what makes me dozy.
sentences.chinese: 也許我喫得太多了，所以昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: For a long time I lay in warm sleepy haze.
sentences.chinese: 我在一種暖洋洋的昏昏欲睡的狀態中躺了很久。

sentences.english: In meetings he sometimes reads from notes and “drifts off”.
sentences.chinese: 有時候開會期間他會看筆記然後“昏昏欲睡”。

sentences.english: And I said I didn't like the way he got things done-sleeping on the job.
sentences.chinese: 我說我不喜歡它做的事，工作的時候昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: In tests, animals injected with prolactin became drowsy immediately.
sentences.chinese: 在試驗中，動物注射催乳素立即會變得昏昏欲睡。

definition: variant of 頭昏腦脹|头昏脑胀[tou2 hun1 nao3 zhang4]
dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
swelling of the head (physical condition)/fig. swellheaded/conceited
erhua variant of 打盹[da3 dun3]
